Text: RE Cross ReceiptThank you Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Tuesday November PM To Heinitz Mary J Subject Re Cross Receipt Importance High Sent to Sent from my BlackBerry Wireless Handheld wwwBlackBerrynet

Cross ReceiptMr Hayslett Travis McCullough asked me to track down the Cross Receipt which was returned to him possibly today Do you recall what floor it was directed to This probably sounds like a stupid question but Travis has been working out of several offices here on both and and he is in New York now I just want to be sure we do not lose the Cross Receipt Thank you Mary Heinitz Senior Legal Specialist phone fax

RE Cross ReceiptSorry to bother you again but was it sent in an interoffice mail envelope or handdelivered It has not turned up yet Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Tuesday November PM To Heinitz Mary J Subject Re Cross Receipt Importance High Sent to Sent from my BlackBerry Wireless Handheld wwwBlackBerrynet

RE Cross ReceiptSorry for the earlier message It just arrived and I am having it picked up Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Tuesday November PM To Heinitz Mary J Subject Re Cross Receipt Importance High Sent to Sent from my BlackBerry Wireless Handheld wwwBlackBerrynet

FW UCC Lien SearchesI thought he knew this they are to prepare the filings correct Original Message From Lech Kalembka ENRON Sent Friday November PM To Korkmas Deb Cc Heinitz Mary J Subject Re UCC Lien Searches Same question as in my prior message Specifically should we also prepare filings Lech Kalembka Cadwalader Wickersham Taft Maiden Lane New York NY Tel Fax Email Korkmas Deb To DebKorkmas cc Heinitz Mary J ENRONcom MaryJ NRONcom Office Subject UCC Lien Searches AM Here are a few more names for UCC Lien Searches Incorporated in Virginia Dominion Resources Inc Tredegar St Richmond VA Virginia Power Energy Marketing Inc Dominion Blvd Glen Allen VA Incorporated in Delaware Dominion Exploration Production Inc CNG Tower Poydras St New Orleans LA Dominion Field Services Inc West Main Street Clarksburg WV Dominion Transmission Inc West Main Street Clarksburg WV Thanks for your assistance Deb Korkmas Enron North America Corp Smith Street ECN A Houston TX Phone Fax This email is the FW UCC filings Cc Are you planning to address Lechs request Or is he in need of details that somebody else at Cadwalader already has Original Message From Lech Kalembka ENRON Sent Monday November AM To Heinitz Mary J Korkmas Deb Subject UCC filings It might be easiest if you would send me the agreements related to the UCC filings That way I will have names addresses etc in one place Thank you Lech Kalembka Cadwalader Wickersham Taft Maiden Lane New York NY Tel Fax Email NOTE The information in this email is confidential and may be legally privileged If you are not the intended recipient you must not read use or disseminate the information Although this email and any attachments are believed to be free of any virus or other defect that might affect any computer system into which it is received and opened it is the responsibility of the recipient to ensure that it is virus free and no responsibility is accepted by Cadwalader Wickersham Taft for any loss or damage arising in any way from its use

FW Electronic Trading Agreement ETAIs this something you would handle It is not from my group Original Message From Thorne Judy Sent Thursday September PM To Heinitz Mary J Subject FW Electronic Trading Agreement ETA Mary I believe that you have the original for our contract with Intercontinental Exchange Can you please take care of making the following correction to that contract If you do not have the contract please let me know so I can make sure that I get this to the right person Thanks Judy Original Message From Mrha Jean Sent Wednesday September PM To Thorne Judy Subject FW Electronic Trading Agreement ETA FYI Regards Jean Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday September PM To Mrha Jean Subject Electronic Trading Agreement ETA Dear Ms Jean Mrha Your firm has an ETA with us On our original on page six the effective date was left off Please insert as this date on your original Sorry for the inconvenience Thank you for your time and consideration in this matter

RE Electronic Trading Agreement ETAThank you Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Thursday September PM To Heinitz Mary J Subject RE Electronic Trading Agreement ETA Ill take care of this Original Message From Heinitz Mary J Sent Thursday September PM To Jones Tana Subject FW Electronic Trading Agreement ETA Is this something you would handle It is not from my group Original Message From Thorne Judy Sent Thursday September PM To Heinitz Mary J Subject FW Electronic Trading Agreement ETA Mary I believe that you have the original for our contract with Intercontinental Exchange Can you please take care of making the following correction to that contract If you do not have the contract please let me know so I can make sure that I get this to the right person Thanks Judy Original Message From Mrha Jean Sent Wednesday September PM To Thorne Judy Subject FW Electronic Trading Agreement ETA FYI Regards Jean Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday September PM To Mrha Jean Subject Electronic Trading Agreement ETA Dear Ms Jean Mrha Your firm has an ETA with us On our original on page six the effective date was left off Please insert as this date on your original Sorry for the inconvenience Thank you for your time and consideration in this matter

LTX CorporationI have been asked to verify whether ENA has any current transactions with the subject company Please reply ASAP whether your group does or does not have any current transactions or interests with this company Thank you Mary Heinitz Senior Legal Specialist phone fax

West Virginia title received Cc Okay all I am sure there is a very good deal behind this but do any of you know where the recently received state of West Virginia title to a used trailer belongs The year of the trailer is the make of the trailer is NORS and the serial number is NTN The title was issued by WV on to Enron North America Corp no lienholder well thats a good fact Please ask around your groups regarding who is interested in holding on to this title Unless otherwise notified I am going to have it sent to the vault Please call me if you know to whom it should be directed Mary Heinitz Senior Legal Specialist phone fax
